title: Recipe Sharing Platform
description: Developed a recipe-sharing platform allowing users to post, edit, rate, and comment on recipes, enabling full CRUD operations for the users.

title: Blockchain-based Energy Grid System
description: Developed a decentralized platform for energy trading using blockchain technology.

title: Drug Supply Chain Management Using Blockchain Technology
description: Developed a blockchain-based system to track and verify the journey of pharmaceutical products from manufacturers to end customers, enhancing transparency and reducing counterfeit drug circulation.
